# Changelog

## 0.4.0

- Upgrade to Yarn 3

## 0.3.0

- Add core-js pinning to `3.30.x`
- Enable overriding the core-js version via options

## 0.2.1

- Add core-js pinning to `3.25.x`
- Add missing prettierignore entries for side-wide files

## 0.2.0

- Update `core-js` to `3.25.x`

## 0.1.0

Initial release
